summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code; amending Section 11.14.420 of the Seattle Municipal Code (angle parking); amending Chapter 11.14 (sign); amending Section 11.22.080 (improper display of license tabs); amending Section 11.26.080 (service parking permits); amending Section 11.31.010 (suspended vehicle registration); amending Section 11.56.020 (conformity with state law); amending Sections 11.56.220, 11.56.240, 11.56.260, 11.56.280, 11.56.300 and 11.56.310 to refer to ("accidents" in lieu of collisions); amending Chapter 11.56 (driving with suspended vehicle registration); amending Chapter 11.70 (angle and parallel parking); and amending Section 11.72.351 (correct state statute reference).
